snippet.title: Minecraft Legends: Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Get a closer look at the gameplay of Minecraft Legends, releasing on April 18. Explore lush biomes filled with treasures and perils, meet new friends, and reunite with familiar mobs. Lead your friends and face the piglins in intense battles – but be warned: they always fight back.

Developed by Mojang Studios and Blackbird Interactive, Minecraft Legends is an action strategy game coming on April 18, 2023 on Xbox Game Pass, PC Game Pass, Windows, Xbox Series X|S, and Xbox One.

Pre-order and learn more about Minecraft Legends at https://www.minecraft.net/legends
